author: TheoryPatient6067
comment: We cant help u much but to tell u to just start wi the revision. I dont know what will be out fully too, but dont just stay here expecting for resources to come rushing in. Use what you have and be independent enough to self research. Like i dont understand what is the trend of students coming here, asking what to do to prepare. The topics are there.
analysis:
```json
{
  "sentiment": "negative",
  "topics": ["academic"],
  "complaints": ["Students are not independent enough", "Students expect resources to be readily available", "Students are asking for help with exam preparation instead of self-studying"],
  "suggestions": ["Students should start revising immediately", "Students should utilize available resources and self-research", "Students should be more independent in their learning"]
}
```

author: mount2010
comment: Also do the mock quiz. This is incredibly important - the mock quiz allows you to predict questions that will come out in the real quiz.
